segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, focused intently on drying the plate, completely unaware of the chaos happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water cascades over the front edge of the sink, forming a growing puddle that spreads across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s surprising how she doesn’t even flinch despite standing in the rising water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she’s so absorbed in her task that she misses the obvious hazard at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, however, seem to thrive on this little moment of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is daring enough to climb that unstable stool, searching for cookies, while the girl waits eagerly below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast between the serene garden outside and the chaos of this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
